sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

name: programme
trans: n. 计划，规划；节目；程序

sentences.english: the US space program

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions which are designed to achieve something important

name: program
trans: vt. 用程序指令；为…制订计划；为…安排节目
vi. 编程序；安排节目；设计电脑程式

sentences.english: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.chinese: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation

trans: n. 截面；部分；部门；地区；章节
vt. 把…分段；将…切片；对…进行划分
vi. 被切割成片；被分成部分

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

sentences.english: The Cloud Mouse is a project of Microsoft researcher Richard Harper and his collaborators at Microsoft Research Asia.
sentences.chinese: 云鼠标是微软研究员理查德哈珀和他的合作者在微软亚洲研究院的一个项目 。

sentences.english: Let me just conclude this post by saying, our passion for search is stronger than ever - and as a search researcher, I have the best job in the world :-).
sentences.chinese: 在这篇帖子结束的时候我想说，我们对搜索的热情比任何时候都强烈-作为一个搜索研究员，我有世界上最好的工作:)。

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.chinese: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.english: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.chinese: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

name: climate
trans: n. 气候；风气；思潮；风土

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ warm dry climate
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
detailed_translations.english: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.

name: product
trans: n. 产品；结果； 乘积；作品

sentences.english: The London factory assembles the finished product .
sentences.chinese: 伦敦工厂组装成品。

sentences.english: He works in marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 他从事营销和产品开发。

sentences.english: Paula was the product of a sheltered middle-class home.
sentences.chinese: 葆拉是备受呵护的中产阶级家庭的产物。

name: poverty
trans: n. 贫困；困难；缺少；低劣

sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.english: scenes of abject poverty

sentences.english: the causes of urban poverty
sentences.chinese: 造成城市贫困的原因

detailed_translations.english: the situation or experience of being poor

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

name: environmental
trans: adj. 环境的，周围的；有关环境的

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

trans: vi. 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退
vt. 不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

trans: vt. 通知；为…做广告；使突出
vi. 做广告，登广告；作宣传

sentences.english: They no longer advertise alcohol or cigarettes at sporting events.
sentences.chinese: 他们不再在体育赛事上做烟酒广告了。

sentences.english: Colleges and universities have found that it pays to advertise (=  advertising brings good results  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大专院校发现做广告效果很好。

sentences.english: The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

name: field
trans: n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场
adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的
vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

name: type
trans: n. 类型，品种；模范；样式
vt. 打字；测定（血等）类型

sentences.chinese: 我已经看过几部这种类型的影片了。

sentences.english: He types with two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用两个手指打字。

name: management
trans: n. 管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

sentences.english: a lack of management skills
sentences.chinese: 缺乏管理技巧

sentences.english: a management consultant
sentences.chinese: 一个管理顾问

sentences.english: management training courses
sentences.chinese: 管理培训课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理； 处理； 管理部门， 管理人员

sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.chinese: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

sentences.english: You’re wrong, and I can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 你错了，我可以证明。

sentences.chinese: 为了证明自己的观点，他提到了另外几个结果相似的实验。

sentences.chinese: 对成功的商人们总有一种成见。

sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合

name: extreme
trans: n. 极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物
adj. 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的

sentences.english: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂收取每小时30英镑的人工费。

sentences.chinese: 许多妇女从事繁重的体力劳动。

trans: n. 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人

sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.chinese: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

sentences.chinese: 我们两个社会之间非常现实的历史和文化差异

sentences.chinese: 保持独特的文化特征的愿望

sentences.chinese: 要考虑小说创作时的政治和文化背景，这一点很重要。

sentences.chinese: 他在过去两年中一直是头号种子选手。

detailed_translations.chinese: 种子；根据；精液；萌芽；子孙；原由

sentences.english: a tall athletic man
sentences.chinese: 一个高大强壮的男子

detailed_translations.english: physically strong and good at sport

name: genetic

sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

sentences.english: a victim of racial discrimination
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的受害者

sentences.english: This part of the community needs to be protected from racial prejudice .
sentences.chinese: 需保护社区里的这一部分人，使其免受种族偏见的伤害。

sentences.english: evidence of racial harassment
sentences.chinese: 种族骚扰的证据

sentences.chinese: 争取种族平等的运动

sentences.english: the need for tolerance and racial harmony
sentences.chinese: 包容与种族融洽的必要性

name: scale

vi. 衡量；攀登；剥落；生水垢

sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: The shoe factory is the largest employer in this area.
sentences.chinese: 这家制鞋厂是本地区最大的雇主。

detailed_translations.english: a person, company, or organization that employs people

sentences.chinese: 我们的成绩这个月有所提高。

sentences.english: Are you making some improvements to your home?
sentences.chinese: 你在改善家里的居住条件吗？

detailed_translations.english: the act of improving something or the state of being improved

trans: n. 专利权；执照；专利品
adj. 专利的；新奇的；显然的
vt. 授予专利；取得…的专利权

sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

sentences.english: the products that are currently available
sentences.chinese: 目前供应的产品

sentences.english: He is currently working on his first novel.
sentences.chinese: 他目前正在创作他的第一本小说。

detailed_translations.english: at the present time

name: elite
trans: n. 精英；精华；中坚分子

sentences.english: a struggle for power within the ruling elite
sentences.chinese: 统治阶层内部的争权夺利

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have a lot of power and influence because they have money, knowledge, or special skills

name: poetry
trans: n. 诗；诗意，诗情；诗歌艺术

sentences.english: He reads a lot of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 他大量阅读诗歌。

sentences.english: a poetry magazine
sentences.chinese: 诗歌杂志

detailed_translations.english: poems in general, or the art of writing them

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: broad

sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

sentences.chinese: 保持欧洲一体化发展势头的激励措施

sentences.chinese: 政府往往会在第二届任期中丧失冲劲。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to keep increasing, developing, or being more successful

sentences.english: the storage of highly radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 高放射性材料的存放

sentences.english: storage costs
sentences.chinese: 保管费用

detailed_translations.english: the process of keeping or putting something in a special place while it is not being used

name: various
trans: adj. 各种各样的；多方面的

sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的

name: adolescent
trans: adj. 青春期的；未成熟的

sentences.chinese: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青春期的； 青少年的
detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.
a young person, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, who is developing into an adult

name: declare
trans: vt. 宣布，声明；断言，宣称

sentences.english: A state of emergency has been declared.
sentences.chinese: 已宣布进入紧急状态。

sentences.english: Mr Steel has been declared bankrupt
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂尔先生被宣布破产了。

sentences.chinese: 我们在9月16日举行庆祝活动，这一天是墨西哥摆脱西班牙统治宣布独立的日子。

detailed_translations.english: to state officially and publicly that a particular situation exists or that something is true

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

name: male
trans: adj. 男性的；雄性的；有力的

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys

trans: n. 百分比；百分率，百分数

sentences.english: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.english: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.chinese: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

detailed_translations.english: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100

sentences.chinese: 有120人在中国这起最惨烈的空难事故中丧生。

sentences.english: the economic consequences of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster
sentences.chinese: 切尔诺贝利核灾难给经济带来的后果

sentences.chinese: 1987年的飓风是英格兰数十年来遭遇的最为严重的自然灾害。

sentences.chinese: 一名登山者从山上滑落，他们的探险活动险些以灾难告终。

sentences.english: The drought could spell disaster for wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 干旱可能会对野生生物造成灾难。

sentences.english: Disaster struckwhen two men were killed during their parachute jumps.
sentences.chinese: 灾难突然降临，两名男子在跳伞过程中丧生。

sentences.english: The peace process was on the brink of disaster .
sentences.chinese: 和平进程到了灾难的边缘。

sentences.english: Luckily the pilot saw the other plane just in time, and a disaster was narrowly averted .
sentences.chinese: 幸好驾驶员及时看到了另一架飞机，侥幸避免了一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden event such as a flood, storm, or accident which causes great damage or suffering

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

name: female
trans: n. 女人； 雌性动物
adj. 女性的；雌性的；柔弱的，柔和的

sentences.english: female voters
sentences.chinese: 女性选民

sentences.english: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.chinese: 半数以上的员工是女性。

detailed_translations.english: relating to women or girls

name: welfare
trans: n. 福利；幸福；福利事业；安宁
adj. 福利的；接受社会救济的

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

sentences.english: Farmers struggling for survival strip the forests for agricultural land.
sentences.chinese: 为生存而挣扎的农民们把森林伐光来作农业用地。

detailed_translations.english: Agricultural means involving or relating to agriculture

sentences.english: He called for a common European policy on immigration.
sentences.chinese: 他要求欧洲国家实施共同的移民政策。

detailed_translations.english: the process of entering another country in order to live there permanently

sentences.english: politicians who are trying to get the minority vote
sentences.chinese: 努力争取少数族群选票的政治家

sentences.english: a British Labour politician
sentences.chinese: 英国工党政治家

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in politics, especially an elected member of the government

name: tackle
trans: n. 滑车；装备；用具；扭倒
vt. 处理；抓住；固定；与…交涉

sentences.english: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.english: fishing tackle
sentences.chinese: 渔具

detailed_translations.english: to try to deal with a difficult problem
the equipment used in some sports and activities, especially fishing

sentences.english: The steam engine was the greatest technological advance of the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机是19世纪最伟大的技术进步。

detailed_translations.english: related to technology

name: admission
trans: n. 承认；入场费；进入许可；坦白；录用

sentences.english: Reese, by his own admission , lacks the necessary experience.
sentences.chinese: 里斯自己也承认缺乏必要的经验。

sentences.english: No admission after 10 pm.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10点以后免进。

sentences.english: The Museum has no admission charge .
sentences.chinese: 那家博物馆不收门票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认；准许进(加)入；入场费
detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you admit that something is true or that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.chinese: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

sentences.english: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.english: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.chinese: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.english: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.chinese: 使用电池的吹风机

detailed_translations.english: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

name: deposit
trans: n. 存款；押金；订金；保证金；沉淀物

sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.english: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.chinese: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

name: effectively
trans: adv. 有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上

sentences.english: Children have to learn to communicate effectively.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子应该学会有效地沟通。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that produces the result that was intended

name: haven
trans: n. 港口；避难所，安息所
vt. 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中

sentences.english: ...Lake Baringo, a freshwater haven for a mixed variety of birds.
sentences.chinese: …百瑞高湖，一个适合各种鸟类的淡水栖息地。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people or animals can live peacefully or go to in order to be safe

detailed_translations.chinese: 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中

name: institute
trans: vt. 开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼）

sentences.english: We will institute a number of measures to better safeguard the public.
sentences.chinese: 我们将制定许多措施更好地保护公众。

sentences.english: research institutes
sentences.chinese: 研究所

detailed_translations.english: If you institute a system, rule, or course of action, you start it

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔从事科研或教育等的〕机构；学院；研究院
detailed_translations.english: an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based

name: necessarily
trans: adv. 必要地；必定地，必然地

sentences.chinese: 照顾老年人必定要干很多搬重物的活儿。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that cannot be different or be avoided

sentences.chinese: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。

trans: n. 焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事

sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.english: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.english: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.chinese: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

trans: n. 种类，分类； 范畴

sentences.chinese: 属45岁以上年龄组的人

sentences.english: Seats are available in eight of the ten price categories .
sentences.chinese: 座位共有10种票价，现有8种可售。

sentences.chinese: 威廉斯的风格不能轻易归入爵士乐的范畴。

trans: n. 综合学校；专业综合测验
adj. 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的

sentences.chinese: 我们为客户提供全面的金融产品。

sentences.chinese: 一本介绍英国酒店和餐厅的详尽指南

sentences.english: The following guidelines do not aim to be totally comprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 以下指导原则并非想要面面俱到。

sentences.english: high standards of craftsmanship
sentences.chinese: 很高的工艺水准

sentences.chinese: …森林生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment

name: embrace
trans: vt. 拥抱；信奉，皈依；包含

sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

sentences.english: Fruit and vegetables are high in fibre content .
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜的纤维素含量很高。

sentences.english: food that is high in dietary fibre
sentences.chinese: 富含膳食纤维的食物

sentences.english: Nylon is a man-made fibre.
sentences.chinese: 尼龙是一种人造纤维。

name: frequently
trans: adv. 频繁地，经常地；时常，屡次

sentences.chinese: 他经常喝醉。

detailed_translations.english: very often or many times

sentences.english: Your building society or bank will help arrange a mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你加入的购房互助协会或银行将会给你安排抵押贷款。

sentences.english: They’ve taken out a 30 year mortgage (= they will pay for their house over a period of 30 years ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们办理了一笔30年期的抵押贷款。

sentences.chinese: 我们决定用弗雷德的遣散费来偿清抵押贷款。

sentences.english: Mortgage rates are set to rise again in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 抵押贷款利率到春季肯定还要上涨。

if you mortgage your home, land, or property, you borrow money, usually from a bank, and if you cannot pay back the money within a particular period of time, the bank has the right to sell your property in order to get the money you owe it

sentences.english: a potentially dangerous situation
sentences.chinese: 有潜在危险的局势

trans: n. 摩天楼，超高层大楼；特别高的东西

sentences.chinese: 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。

sentences.english: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me .
sentences.chinese: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a top needle of a skyscraper is pressing toward him. He fails to dodge and bumps heavily on the concrete needle.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一座摩天大厦的尖型顶柱朝他逼来，他躲避不及，重重地撞在混凝土顶柱上。

sentences.chinese: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

sentences.chinese: 我收到莫伊拉的一封短信，一定要我保持联系。

name: anticipate

sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.chinese: 好的演讲者能够预先考虑到听众需要什么、关注什么。

sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔热切地期待着她的到来。

name: bulb

vi. 生球茎；膨胀成球状

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

name: cave

sentences.chinese: 洞穴的入口

detailed_translations.chinese: 使凹陷，使塌落；在…挖洞穴

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

name: exhibit
trans: n. 展览品；证据；展示会
vt. 展览；显示；提出（证据等）

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

name: proportion
trans: n. 比例，占比；部分；面积；均衡
vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊

sentences.english: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.english: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

sentences.chinese: 因特网服务供应商

detailed_translations.english: a company or person that provides a service

sentences.english: The findings of this sociologist are very interesting because they illustrate once again the relationship that exists between what we do in the present and the results we obtain in the future.
sentences.chinese: 这个社会学家的发现是非常有趣的，因为他们在一次的说明我们现在做的和我们未来获得的结果有关系。

sentences.chinese: 美国不仅不应该存在社会阶级，而且那几乎是一个肮脏的词——用一位社会学家的话来说就是“美国所禁忌的思想”。

name: thrive
trans: vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茁壮成长

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

name: appropriate
trans: adj. 适当的；恰当的；合适的

sentences.english: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose

name: chip
trans: n.  芯片；筹码；碎片；(食物的) 小片; 薄片

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

name: equality
trans: n. 平等；相等； 等式

sentences.english: ...equality of the sexes.
sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等同； 平等； 相等
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people have the same rights, advantages etc

sentences.english: You can use the gym and pool for a fee of £35 a month.
sentences.chinese: 月付35英镑，即可使用健身房和游泳池。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you pay to do something or that you pay to a professional person for their work

name: garage
trans: n. 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库
vt. 把……送入车库；把（汽车）开进车库

sentences.english: I’ll just go and put the car in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我把车停到车库去。

sentences.english: an automatic garage door
sentences.chinese: 车库自动门

detailed_translations.english: a building for keeping a car in, usually next to or attached to a house

sentences.english: The feedback will be used to modify the course for next year.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.english: The regulations can only be modified by a special committee.
sentences.chinese: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

detailed_translations.english: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

name: monarch
trans: n. 君主，帝王；最高统治者

sentences.english: Britain's head of state is a constitutional monarch.
sentences.chinese: 英国的国家元首是君主立宪的国王或女王。

detailed_translations.english: a king or queen

name: odds
trans: n. 几率；胜算；不平等；差别

sentences.english: (= it is likely ) that he will commit the same crime again.
sentences.chinese: 他可能还会犯同样的罪行。

sentences.english: (= how likely is it ) that they will mess up?
sentences.chinese: 他们失败的可能性有多大？

sentences.english: a new company that has beaten the odds and succeeded (= it was not likely to succeed, but it did )
sentences.chinese: 战胜逆境而取得成功的一家新公司

detailed_translations.english: how likely it is that something will or will not happen

name: peak
trans: n. 山峰；最高点；顶点；帽舌
vt. 使达到最高点；使竖起
vi. 消瘦；到达最高点；变憔悴

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks

sentences.chinese: 来自一百多个国家的代表出席了在日内瓦举行的国际和平大会。
